verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul! <S%H5315><s%>
I will praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> while I live; <S%H9132><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to my God <S%H430><s%> while <S%H5750><s%> I have my being.
Do not trust <S%H982><s%> in princes, <S%H5081><s%> In mortal <S%H1121><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> in whom <S%H7945><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> salvation. <S%H8668><s%>
His spirit <S%H7307><s%> departs, <S%H3318><s%> he returns <S%H7725><s%> to the earth; <S%H127><s%> In that very day <S%H3117><s%> his thoughts <S%H6250><s%> perish.
How blessed <S%H835><s%> is he whose <S%H7945><s%> help <S%H5828><s%> is the God <S%H410><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Whose hope <S%H7664><s%> is in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his God; <S%H430><s%>
Who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth, <S%H776><s%> The sea <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is in them; Who keeps <S%H8104><s%> faith <S%H571><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%>

Who executes <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> for the oppressed; <S%H6231><s%> Who gives <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry. <S%H7457><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> sets <S%H5425><s%> the prisoners <S%H631><s%> free. <S%H6605><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> opens <S%H6491><s%> [the eyes of] the blind; <S%H5787><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> raises <S%H2210><s%> up those who are bowed <S%H3721><s%> down; <S%H3721><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> the righteous; <S%H6662><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> protects <S%H8104><s%> the strangers; <S%H1616><s%> He supports <S%H9388><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the widow; <S%H490><s%> But He thwarts <S%H5791><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will reign <S%H4427><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> Thy God, <S%H430><s%> O Zion, <S%H6726><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
